rukus.text: 97|2|geojughan bam-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
97|3|geolughan i bam-eun cheongaewolboda deo hullyunghan bam-eulo
97|4|i bam-e cheonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul bad-a ganglim hayeo
97|5|achim dongnyeok-kkaji meomuleumyeo pyeong-an hasoseo lago insahadeola
